summary: Sinister forces compete to find the million dollars in gold hidden by recently deceased gangster Joe Valerie in his family's old dark house 15 years earlier,
cast: Stuart Erwin|Dorothy Wilson|Warner Oland|Dudley Digges|Gertrude Hoffman|Oscar Apfel|Frank Reicher|Jane Darwell|Stanley Blystone|Ed Brady|Tom Brower|Pat O'Malley|Ted Oliver|Irving Pichel|Max Wagner
title: Antes del amanecer
